name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear audio quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking with heart rate monitoring, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant up to 50 meters.

name: Premium Cotton T-Shirt
description: Ultra-soft 100% organic cotton t-shirt with a comfortable fit. Available in multiple colors and sizes. Perfect for casual wear.

name: Laptop Stand with Cooling
description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand with built-in cooling fan. Ergonomic design to reduce neck strain and improve airflow.

name: Ceramic Plant Pot Set
description: Beautiful set of 3 ceramic plant pots with drainage holes and saucers. Perfect for indoor plants and herbs. Modern minimalist design.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with advanced cushioning technology. Breathable mesh upper and durable rubber outsole for all-terrain running.

name: Coffee Table Book Collection
description: Beautiful collection of photography and art books. Perfect for coffee tables and inspiring conversations. High-quality printing and binding.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator and overcharge protection.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Classic denim jacket with a modern fit. Made from premium denim with subtle distressing. Perfect for layering in any season.

name: Kitchen Knife Set
description: Professional 6-piece kitchen knife set with wooden block. High-carbon stainless steel blades with ergonomic handles.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Non-slip premium yoga mat with extra cushioning. Eco-friendly materials with carrying strap included. Perfect for all yoga practices.

name: Programming Guide Book
description: Comprehensive guide to modern programming languages and best practices. Perfect for beginners and experienced developers alike.

name: Smartphone Camera Lens Kit
description: Professional camera lens kit for smartphones. Includes wide-angle, macro, and fisheye lenses with carrying case.

name: Wool Sweater
description: Cozy merino wool sweater with cable knit pattern. Soft, warm, and breathable. Perfect for cold weather styling.

name: LED String Lights
description: Warm white LED string lights perfect for creating ambient lighting. Waterproof design suitable for indoor and outdoor use.

name: Basketball
description: Official size and weight basketball with premium composite leather. Deep channel design for superior grip and control.
